title: Touch ASIC Architect (Digital)
summary: Design, develop, and launch next-generation Touch Technologies in Apple products!...
description: You will be architecting Touch sensing systems and the ASICs required to realize them. You will also be expected to take high level user requirements and create a realizable system that meets these goals...
key_qualifications: Experience leading chip architecture and/or digital design is desirable, preferably in touch or communications...
education_experience: BS and a minimum of 10 years relevant industry experience.
